title: ESG & Sustainability Website
challenge: Create a user-friendly, visually engaging website that effectively communicates ESG Matrix's value proposition and offerings to a diverse audience, including a Blog section. Simplify the complex landscape of ESG and Sustainability and address the common pain points encountered.
technologies: Astro.js, Tailwind CSS, Typescript, Astro content collections (.mdx), Git, GitHub, SEO Optimisation, Vercel

bullets: Promotes ESG & Sustainability services and solutions to a wide audience
Clearly communicates complex ESG concepts and solutions
News section shares insights and enhances thought leadership in ESG & Sustainability
Increased traffic and lead generation with SEO optimisations and sharing News posts on LinkedIn

solutions.title: New Website and Blog
solutions.problem: The ESG and Sustainability landscape is complex with a wide scope across industries. ESG Matrix needed a website that effectively communicates their value proposition and offerings.
solutions.solution: Client needs a clear, engaging website that communicates ESG and Sustainability concepts simply and highlights their services effectively. Include a Blog section to share insights and thought leadership in ESG and Sustainability.
solutionbullets: Website communicates the client's value proposition and offerings
Content is clear and engaging to attract and retain visitors
Blog/News section provides valuable insights and thought leadership in ESG and Sustainability, attracting a wider audience and establishing ESG Matrix as a trusted resource in the industry
impactbullets: Content-rich website attracts and retains visitors
SEO Optimisations boost traffic and visibility
News articles increased traffic, engagement and time spent on site and helped with lead generation via LinkedIn posts
Clear communication of ESG concepts and solutions leads to increased enquiries and client engagement
